1.name: 1. Lawrence of Arabia
1.description: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.

2.name: 2. Lolita
2.description: A middle-aged college professor becomes infatuated with a 14-year-old girl.

3.name: 3. Seppuku
3.description: When a ronin requesting seppuku at a feudal lord's palace is told of the brutal suicide of another ronin who previously visited, he reveals how their pasts are intertwined - and in doing so challenges the clan's integrity.

4.name: 4. The Beverly Hillbillies
4.description: A nouveau-riche hillbilly family moves to Beverly Hills and shakes up the privileged society with their hayseed ways.

5.name: 5. To Kill a Mockingbird
5.description: Atticus Finch, a widowed lawyer in Depression-era Alabama, defends a Black man against an undeserved rape charge, and tries to educate his young children against prejudice.

6.name: 6. The Candidate of Manchuria
6.description: An American POW in the Korean War is brainwashed as an unwitting assassin for an international Communist conspiracy.

7.name: 7. Dr. No
7.description: A resourceful British government agent seeks answers in a case involving the disappearance of a colleague and the disruption of the American space program.

8.name: 8. The virginian
8.description: Personable Western series based in Wyoming from the 1890s onward.

9.name: 9. The Alfred Hitchcock Hour
9.description: "The Alfred Hitchcock Hour" was a continuation of the dramatic anthology series Alfred Hitchcock Presents (1955) hosted by the Master of Suspense and Mystery.

10.name: 10. What Ever Happened to Baby Jane?
10.description: A former child star torments her paraplegic sister in their decaying Hollywood mansion.

11.name: 11. The Longest Day
11.description: The events of D-Day, told on a grand scale from both the Allied and German points of view.

12.name: 12. Billy Budd
12.description: When a kind-hearted sailor is made to join an English vessel at war in 1797, he finds himself caught between devotion to his crewmates and obedience to their hated, cruel master-at-arms.

13.name: 13. The Man Who Shot Liberty Valance
13.description: A senator returns to a Western town for the funeral of an old friend and tells the story of his origins.

14.name: 14. Freud
14.description: An examination of Czech-Austrian psychologist Sigmund Freud's career when he began to treat patients diagnosed with hysteria, using the radical technique of hypnosis.

15.name: 15. Combat!
15.description: Combat!, a one-hour World War II drama series, followed a front line American infantry squad as they battled their way across Europe

16.name: 16. The Saint
16.description: Simon (the Saint) Templar's an adventurer, and friend to those in need. Where his money comes from isn't mentioned, but, he travels europe in his white Volvo P1800S righting wrongs.

17.name: 17. How the West Was Won
17.description: A family saga covering several decades of Westward expansion in the 19th century, including the Gold Rush, the Civil War, and the building of the railroads.

18.name: 18. The Music Man
18.description: Traveling con artist Harold Hill targets the naïve residents of a small town in 1910s Iowa by posing as a boys' band leader to raise money before he can skip town.

19.name: 19. The Jetsons
19.description: The misadventures of a futuristic family.

20.name: 20. Carnival of Souls
20.description: After a traumatic accident, a woman becomes drawn to a mysterious abandoned carnival.

21.name: 21. Night of the Eagle
21.description: A woman who may be a witch defends her husband from forces attempting to harm him.

22.name: 22. Mutiny on the Bounty
22.description: In 1787, British ship Bounty leaves Portsmouth to bring a cargo of bread-fruit from Tahiti, but the savage on-board conditions imposed by Captain Bligh trigger a mutiny led by first officer Fletcher Christian.

23.name: 23. Cape Fear
23.description: A lawyer's family is stalked by a man he once helped put in jail.

24.name: 24. The Lucy Show
24.description: The wacky misadventures of a forever-scheming woman, her reluctant best friend, and her cantankerous boss.

25.name: 25. Cléo de 5 à 7
25.description: Cleo, a singer and hypochondriac, becomes increasingly worried that she might have cancer while awaiting test results from her doctor.
